body.name: Luxury Modern Smart Toilet with Bidet Built in,One Piece Elongated Inteligente Toilet with Automatic Toilet Seat, Tankless toilet for Bathroom with Auto Open/Close Lid,Auto Flush,Warm Water
body.stockDetail: Only 10 left in stock - order soon.
features: Using the DMXINM smart toilet, you'll be able to enjoy a warm and comfortable bathroom experience. Our smart toilet is equipped with an advanced constant temperature heating system, allowing you to adjust the seat, water, and warm air temperatures according to your preferences. No longer will you have to endure the discomfort of cold surfaces affecting your body.

Radar-sensing automatic opening/closing of the toilet lid, foot-sensing opening/closing of the toilet seat, off-seat flushing, foot-sensing flushing – we prioritize user experience, providing maximum convenience tailored to the habits of different users in the household. All functions of the smart toilet can be controlled via a remote, and we've included side-mounted knob shortcuts for quick activation of certain features. The LED screen displays real-time information corresponding to the settings. This is the convenience expected of smart home devices.

The DMXINM smart toilet enhances your personal hygiene by offering various cleaning modes, including buttock cleaning, feminine cleaning, oscillating massage cleaning, and self-cleaning nozzle. You can also adjust the water temperature and flow intensity using the remote control. No more enduring the friction and irritation from dry toilet paper on your skin!

The DMXINM smart toilet comes with a multitude of thoughtful design details. For instance, it features a power outage flushing module designed to address unexpected power outages. Additionally, it includes various other functions such as a night light, fragrance dispenser, and a quiet-closing design. These considerate details aim to provide you with a comprehensive and delightful experience during use. We hope it delivers an unparalleled level of comfort for your toilet experience.

Outstanding customer support – feel free to reach out to us anytime if you have any questions, and we will do our utmost to assist you! DMXINM provides a two-year warranty on its toilets, ensuring free repairs for material and craftsmanship defects for all customers under normal usage, correct installation, and maintenance for a period of two (2) years from the date of purchase.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: This smart toilet is a perfect combination of contemporary aesthetics and state-of-the-art technology. The automatic lid that opens and closes, the heated seat, warm air drying, female cleansing, rear cleansing, self-cleaning nozzle, power outage flushing, remote/side button control, soft close, and night light not only showcase advanced technology but also bring unparalleled convenience to your daily life. From the comforting warmth of the seat to thorough cleansing, this intelligent toilet takes personal care to an entirely new level. The flexible control options through the remote and side buttons, along with the soothing night light, ensure a peaceful and convenient overall user experience. This intelligent toilet is more than just a symbol of technological progress; it's an essential hygiene component for your home space.

Automated Toilet Seat and Lid Operation with Built-In Auto-Flush Capability Approaching this intelligent toilet triggers radar sensors, the lid effortlessly opens, delivering unparalleled convenience. After use, simply step away, and the intelligent toilet will automatically flush, eliminating the need to press any buttons. This level of automation goes beyond cutting-edge; it introduces an unmatched level of comfort to your experience. Experience the convenience of futuristic living – an essential upgrade for your home. For men during urination, the convenience is exceptional. Equipped with foot sensors, the toilet seat automatically lifts. This intelligent toilet is genuinely considerate, providing ultimate convenience and comfort for various usage scenarios.

Don't let the cold bother you with a toilet seat that offers a comfortably warm experience. The seat heating feature delivers a warm sensation the moment you sit down, creating a sense of thoughtful care that enhances the overall comfort of the entire usage process. Particularly during chilly seasons, this warmth becomes an eagerly anticipated delight every time you use the restroom. As for the warm air drying function, it introduces a whole new approach to drying. With a simple touch of a button, a gentle and swift stream of warm air emerges, offering an unparalleled sense of freshness. This warmth and considerate design appear to add a touch of luxury to your personal hygiene routine.

Experience comprehensive care with the warm water cleansing feature of our smart toilet. Adjust water temperature, flow intensity, and cleaning position effortlessly using the remote. Rear Wash The rear wash delivers a gentle and refreshing experience with a simple button press. The warm water jets create a sensation similar to a private spa, leaving you feeling rejuvenated. Female Wash Specially crafted for female users, the feminine wash function features a meticulously designed, gentle yet effective water flow. It provides a caring and comfortable experience, ensuring peace of mind. Oscillating Massage Wash Indulge in a unique relaxation experience with the oscillating massage wash. The gently moving spray wand provides a soothing massage-like sensation, as if you're being pampered in the comfort of your own home. Self-cleaning Before each use, the nozzle undergoes a quick automatic cleaning, ensuring hygiene. You can also independently initiate a self-cleaning function for a more thorough cleanse. This considerate design eliminates the hassle of tedious cleaning tasks, making the entire experience effortless and enjoyable.

Our smart toilets boast numerous practical design details that reflect in every aspect, a result of our careful consideration and dedication to our customers. Remote Control The remote control allows you to effortlessly adjust water temperature, flow intensity, and cleaning positions. It gives you the ability to personalize your experience at your fingertips, making our smart toilet a truly customizable device to meet your individual needs. Side Rotary Button For a more traditional and intuitive control method, the side quick buttons provide a simple yet effective solution. With easy button presses, you can swiftly activate the desired functions. Power Outage Flushing The power outage flushing feature continuous operation even during electrical outages. In emergency situations, you can confidently trust our smart toilet to maintain efficient and hygienic flushing, unaffected by any external disruptions. Night Light The night light function and display screen further enhance your user experience. The soft night light provides ample brightness during nighttime use, and the display screen clearly shows the current settings, ensuring you're always informed about the toilet's status.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Experience unparalleled comfort with this smart toilet. Its warm seat ensures a cozy feeling every time you sit down, catering perfectly to those who are sensitive to the cold. A family-friendly upgrade that brings warmth to your bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really like the user-friendly shortcut button design of this smart toilet. The patterns are intuitive and simple, making it easy to operate. This user-friendly interface adds to the overall convenience and ease of use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Customized Comfort Settings
reviews.reviewText: Tailoring my bathroom experience, this intelligent toilet offers customized comfort settings. From adjustable water temperature to personalized cleansing options, it adapts to individual preferences, adding a touch of personalization to my daily routine.
